meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>doubt</kanji> <kanji>problem</kanji> is caused by having too much <vocabulary>doubt</vocabulary>. Just think about it. Don't doubt yourself, it's why you're getting those vocab words wrong! :P
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
